content: Hi Folks, we've an E-SIG meeting due for tomorrow, October 15th. We're nearing the end of the target document phase of the E-SIG. It is exciting as we can now start to focus on some pressing and rather interesting questions, like the topics of shared memory, and zero copy ABIs that come with this. I know the WAMR team have already implemented a form of shared memory. Anyway, looking forward to seeing you call on the call tomorrow.
I had to step out for a doctor appt, but wanted to hear the rest of the conversation. @Chris Woods tag me when it's ready!
@Ralph - I have to appologise, I moved from Chicago to Maine, then flew to Germany, I thought I'd have more time than actually exists. Update to the summation table is coming
